Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Hmm, this is a detailed process description about property onboarding. The user wants me to generate open-ended questions to clarify and deepen understanding without getting into technical implementation.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I need to focus on the key aspects: missing details, decision criteria, roles, timing, and exceptions. The questions should be broad enough to encourage elaboration but specific enough to target potential gaps.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I can structure the questions around the phases of the process: initial documentation, property manager assignment, inspection and marketing, tenant screening, and final checks. For each phase, I will ask about triggers, criteria, stakeholders, and exceptions.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I will also include cross-cutting questions about communication, tools, and performance metrics to get a holistic view. The goal is to make the interviewee reflect on their process and reveal nuances that are not explicitly stated.
